title: Selections from a child's garden of verses
creator_credit: Robert Louis Stevenson, Wil Berg and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: Wildberg, who made this film, reads excerpts from Robert Louis Stevenson’s collection including “I have a little shadow” and “The Swing”, while a boy experiences or watches others experience the emotions and sensations of the poems
